languages.text: "Моя коллекция предоставит вам самый большой и богатый выбор во всем Просторе! Однако, даже у такого преданного энтузиаста есть ограничения..."
"My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."
languages.original_text: "Моя коллекция предоставит вам самый большой и богатый выбор во всем Просторе! Однако, даже у такого преданного энтузиаста есть ограничения..."

traits.locale_text: "My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all of Koronus! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."
"My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all of Koronus! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."
"My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."
"My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."
"My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."
"My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."

languages.text: "Meine Sammlung bietet Euch die größte und umfassendste Auswahl in der gesamten Ausdehnung! Doch selbst für einen hingebungsvollen Enthusiasten wie mich gibt es Grenzen ..."
languages.original_text: "My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Sammlung bietet Euch die größte und umfassendste Auswahl in der gesamten Ausdehnung! Doch selbst für einen hingebungsvollen Enthusiasten wie mich gibt es Grenzen ..."

languages.text: « Vous ne trouverez pas de marchandises plus variées dans toutes les Étendues ! Toutefois, même quelqu'un d'aussi enthousiaste que moi a ses limites... »
languages.original_text: "My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne trouverez pas de marchandises plus variées dans toutes les Étendues ! Toutefois, même quelqu'un d'aussi enthousiaste que moi a ses limites... »

languages.text: “整个科罗努斯扩区最丰富、最全面的藏品尽在您眼前！不过，即便是像我这样的狂热收藏家，能力也是有极限的……”
languages.original_text: "My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."

traits.locale_text: “整个科罗努斯扩区最丰富、最全面的藏品尽在您眼前！不过，即便是像我这样的狂热收藏家，能力也是有极限的……”

languages.text: «¡Mi colección le ofrecerá la mayor y mejor selección de toda la Extensión! No obstante, incluso un entusiasta de mi talla tiene sus límites...».
languages.original_text: "My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi colección le ofrecerá la mayor y mejor selección de toda la Extensión! No obstante, incluso un entusiasta de mi talla tiene sus límites...».

languages.text: 「私のコレクションは、エクスパンス全体で最も豊富で幅広い品揃えをお約束します！ただし、私のような熱心な愛好家にも限界はございますが…」
languages.original_text: "My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."

traits.locale_text: 「私のコレクションは、エクスパンス全体で最も豊富で幅広い品揃えをお約束します！ただし、私のような熱心な愛好家にも限界はございますが…」

languages.text: "Koleksiyonum, tüm Enginlik içinde en geniş ve çeşitli seçenekleri sunar! Fakat en tutkulu meraklıların bile bir sınırı vardır."
languages.original_text: "My collection will offer you the biggest and broadest choice in all the Expanse! However, even a devoted enthusiast like myself has his limits..."

traits.locale_text: "Koleksiyonum tüm Enginlik içinde en geniş ve çeşitli seçenekleri sunar! Fakat en tutkulu meraklıların bile bir sınırı vardır."
